snippet: Saying it was frustrated with some of the worst criminal violence in the world, the Honduran congress suspended the attorney general and his assistant.
abstract: Honduran congress suspends attorney general and his assistant and replaces them with temporary oversight committee, saying it is frustrated with some of world's worst criminal violence.
lead_paragraph: Saying it was frustrated with some of the worst criminal violence in the world, the Honduran congress suspended the attorney general and his assistant.
